data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Liverpool's half?
In the minute 1, Andre Marriner signals a throw-in for Fulham, close to Liverpool's area.
Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa (Fulham) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Fulham in the half of Liverpool.
In the minute 2, Fulham's Mario Lemina breaks free at Craven Cottage. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
Ivan Cavaleiro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fulham.
In the minute 5, Fulham have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
Liverpool's Roberto Firmino gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fulham defender.
Free kick Fulham.
In the minute 9, Throw-in high up the field for Liverpool in London.
Liverpool's Mohamed Salah is whistled for offside at Craven Cottage.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
Throw-in for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In the minute 14, In London Fulham drive forward through Ivan Cavaleiro. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Liverpool needs to be cautious. Fulham have an attacking throw-in.
Andre Marriner awards Liverpool a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
Andre Marriner awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 19, At Craven Cottage, Joachim Andersen has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Andre Marriner signals a Fulham throw-in in Liverpool's half.
Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Fulham in the half of Liverpool.
Throw-in Liverpool.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for Liverpool at Craven Cottage.
Fulham's Ademola Lookman gets in a shot on goal at Craven Cottage. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
In the minute 25, Goal! Bobby Reid gives Fulham a 1-0 lead in London.
That's a fine assist from Ademola Lookman.
Liverpool awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 28, Fulham to take a throw-in in Liverpool territory.
Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Fulham.
In the minute 31, Liverpool's Curtis Jones has been booked in London.
Tosin Adarabioyo for Fulham is whistled offside.
Tosin Adarabioyo for Fulham drives towards goal at Craven Cottage. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 32, Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa for Fulham gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Liverpool have a goal kick.
Andre Marriner awards Fulham a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Fulham to take a throw-in in Liverpool territory.
Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
Throw-in for Fulham close to the penalty box.
In the minute 37, Fulham drive forward but Ivan Cavaleiro is judged offside.
Fulham's Ivan Cavaleiro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Throw-in for Liverpool in their own half.
In the minute 40, Sadio Mane (Liverpool) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
Andre Marriner signals a Liverpool throw-in in Fulham's half.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Fulham.
Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 44, Liverpool are coming forward and Mohamed Salah gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Liverpool drive upfield and Roberto Firmino gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fulham defender.
In the minute 45, Fulham have a goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in London.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Can Liverpool capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fulham's half?
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Liverpool.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
Ivan Cavaleiro (Fulham) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Liverpool pushes forward through Mohamed Salah, whose finish on goal is saved.
Takumi Minamino is on a sub for Joel Matip for Liverpool.
In the minute 46, Mario Lemina (Fulham) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Goal kick for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Ivan Cavaleiro (Fulham) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 49, Throw-in Liverpool.
Liverpool have a dangerous throw-in.
Andre Marriner signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 52, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
Liverpool drives forward and Curtis Jones gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In London Fulham attack through Bobby Reid. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 55, Andre Marriner awards Liverpool a goal kick.
Can Liverpool capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
In the minute 57, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Mario Lemina for Fulham who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Andre Marriner signals a Liverpool throw-in in Fulham's half.
Mario Lemina is back on his feet again.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Jordan Henderson for Liverpool drives towards goal at Craven Cottage. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 62, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
Throw-in for Liverpool close to the penalty box.
Liverpool have a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Liverpool in the half of Fulham.
Important block from the Fulham defence as Curtis Jones fires in a strike for Liverpool.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
In the minute 68, Fulham attack but Tosin Adarabioyo's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
The away team have replaced Trent Alexander-Arnold with Neco Williams. This is the second substitution made today by Jurgen Klopp.
In the minute 69, Fulham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Liverpool drive upfield and Neco Williams gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fulham defender.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
In the minute 70, Liverpool have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Fulham.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
In the minute 74, Andre Marriner signals a throw-in for Liverpool, close to Fulham's area.
Aboubakar Kamara is replacing Ruben Loftus-Cheek for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
Free kick Liverpool.
In the minute 75, Ademola Lookman (Fulham) has received a yellow card from Andre Marriner.
Andre Marriner awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 76, Throw-in high up the field for Liverpool in London.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Liverpool close to the penalty box.
Liverpool push forward at Craven Cottage and Georginio Wijnaldum gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fulham defence.
In the minute 78, Liverpool have been awarded a penalty...
Goal! The away team is awarded a penalty in London. Mohamed Salah converts to level the scoring at 1-1.
In the minute 80, Fulham to take a throw-in in Liverpool territory.
Harrison Reed is replacing Mario Lemina for the home team.
Andre Marriner blows against Liverpool's Roberto Firmino for offside.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Liverpool's half?
In the minute 83, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Liverpool at Craven Cottage.
Andre Marriner signals a Fulham throw-in in Liverpool's half.
In the minute 84, Liverpool's Curtis Jones is on target but unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The away team replace Mohamed Salah with Divock Origi.
In the minute 85, Can Fulham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Liverpool's half?
Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fulham needs to be cautious. Liverpool have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 87, Fulham needs to be cautious. Liverpool have an attacking throw-in.
Andre Marriner signals a throw-in for Liverpool, close to Fulham's area.
Scott Parker (Fulham) is making a third substitution, with Joe Bryan replacing Ademola Lookman.
In the minute 89, Andre Marriner awards the home team a throw-in.
Liverpool have a dangerous throw-in.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Andre Marriner.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Goal kick for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Andre Marriner blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
